LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.ShowSpecialRulesDesc: Shows Options related to general special rules.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.IntergrationOptionsDes: Shows Options related to integration with other mods.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowDeepStrikeDesc: "DeepStrike" enables units with this special rule to deploy directly into the heat of battle.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowInfiltrateDesc: "Infiltrate" enables units with this special rule to deploy in hidden positions ahead of the main force.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.ShowWeaponSpecialRules: Shows Options related to weapon special rules
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowRapidFireDesc: Weapons with the "Rapid Fire" special rule shoot twice as many rounds per burst and cooldown is reduced by half when a target is with half of its max range.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowGetsHotDesc: Weapons with the "Gets Hot" special rule have a chance to overheat when fired, this can have varios results, from light burn damage to the weapon exploding.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowJamsDesc: Weapons with the "Jams" special rule have a chance to jam each time its fired, interupting its burst and forcing it into an extended cooldown, this jam can damage the weapon.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowMultiShotDesc: Weapons with the "Multi Shot" special rule function like shotguns, firing a cluster of projectiles each time its fired.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowUserEffectsDesc: Weapons with the "User Effect" special rule have a negative effect that have a chance to affect the user each time a weapon is fired/used.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowForceWeaponEffect: Weapons with the "Force Weapon" special rule when wielded by a psyker(Psychically Sensitive) can instantly kill or down their target with a single hit.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowRendingMeleeEffec: Weapons with the Melee "Rending" special rules attacks have a chance to ignore all armour
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowRendingRangedEffe: Weapons with the Ranged "Rending" special rules projectiles have a chance to ignore all armour
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowImperialWeaponsDe: Allows Imperial Weaponry to spawn (Required for Imperial Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowMechanicusWeapons: Allows Mechanicus Weaponry to spawn (Required for Mechanicus Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowChaosWeaponsDesc: Allows Chaos Weaponry to spawn (Required for Chaos Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowEldarWeaponsDesc: Allows Eldar Weaponry to spawn (Required for Eldar Weaponry Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowDarkEldarWeaponsD: Allows Dark Eldar Weaponry to spawn (Required for Dark Eldar Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowTauWeaponsDesc: Allows Tau Weaponry to spawn (Required for Tau Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowOrkWeaponsDesc: Allows Ork Weaponry to spawn (Required for Ork Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowNecronWeaponsDesc: Allows Necron Weaponry to spawn (Required for Necron Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowTyranidWeaponsDes: Allows Tyranid Weaponry to spawn (Required for Tyranid Factions to spawn)
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.ShowPerformanceOptions: Contains Misc options & options that may increase game performance if disabled.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.RacialResearchRestrict: Restricts research to the relevent race when Humanoid Alien Races is active. !!RESTART REQUIRED!!
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.RacialConstructionRest: Restricts Construction to the relevent race when Humanoid Alien Races is active. !!RESTART REQUIRED!!
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.RacialProductionRestri: Restricts Production to the relevent race when Humanoid Alien Races is active. !!RESTART REQUIRED!!
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowProjectileTrailDe: Allows projectile trails for things like Bolt and Plasma shots.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowProjectileGlowDes: Allows projectile glow for things like Flamer and Plasma shots.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowMuzzlePositionDes: Allows use of the muzzle position of the weapon when spawning projectiles and effects.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowPauldronDrawerDes: Allows apparel to render Pauldrons graphics, disabling this will cause some of the armour to appear differently.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AllowExtraPartDrawerDe: Allows apparel to render extra part graphics, disabling this will cause some of the armour to appear differently.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.RapidFireDesc: Full Firing Cycle time reduced from {5} to {6} when firing at targets within {4} cells.\nWarmup reduced by {0}% ({1} seconds) and Cooldown by {2}% ({3} seconds).
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.GetsHotDesc: This {0} is {1} and has a {2} chance to overheat per shot fired.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.GetsHotCrit: it has a {0} chance to critically overheat, causing more damage to user and weapon.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.GetsHotCritExplosion: Critical overheats have a {0} chance of cuasing the weapon to explode.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.JamsDesc: This {0} is {1} and has a {2} chance to jam per shot fired.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.MeltaDesc: Damage Vs Buildings and AP doubled when firing at targets within {0} cells.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.VolkiteDesc: AP begins to drop off when firing at targets over {0} cells away.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.GaussDesc: has a {0} chance to ignore all armour
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.TeslaDesc: Bolt can arc to up to 3 nearby targets.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.ConversionBeamDesc: Damage and AP increase the further the target is away.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.LaserTurretNoBatteries: Cannot Charge: No Batteries connected to Power Grid
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.OG_WarpStormScale_Loca: a small portion of the map
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.OG_WarpStormScale_Worl: a number of tiles on the world map
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Rending_ShotDesc: has a {0} chance to ignore all armour
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Force_Strike: {0} has been {1} by a Force strike!
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Phased_Out: the shot passes harmlessly through the {1}
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.DeepStrike_Incomming_L: A group of {0} are joining the battle via Deep Strike using {1}!
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Infiltrators_Revealed_: A group of {0} infiltrating were revealed!
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.PlaceWorker_OnTopOfWal: Can only be placed on Walls or Smoothed Stone
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.VatGrowerStartCrafting: Selects a organ to grow and then start filling the vat with the needed ingredients.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.VatGrowerStopCraftingG: Stops the growing process. Refunds inserted ingredients if the process was not started.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.CustomNameCompGizmoDes: Sets a custom name which can be easily indentifiable.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.VatGrowerGenomesHint: No available genomes. Get them by making 'Genome Sequencers' in machining tables, then use them.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.AlertMaintenceRequired: These growers require maintence or they will lose what they are growing and materials will be wasted!\n\nSend a doctor or researcher to maintain at once.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.LetterHumanlikeGrownDe: Welcome vatgrown clone {0} to the colony!\n\nYou can either train them up from scratch with the help of their natural affinities or apply a Brain scan template on them to give them a skillset right away.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.BrainScanningRejectInp: {0} was rejected due to no valid bed could be found.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.ModInfo: This faction is added by {ModName} and not currently present in your game.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.HiddenFactionInfo: This is a hidden faction and won't show up in your faction list.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.RequiredFactionInfo: It is marked as required by {ModName}.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.NonSpawningFactionInfo: This faction is marked as non-spawning and you should probably just ignore it.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.FactionButtonIgnore: Don't ask for this faction again
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.FactionMessageFailedFu: Failed to create a faction with settlements.
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.FactionMinDistance: The minimum distance from player bases (recommended are {0}): {1}
LanguageData.AdeptusMechanicus.Warning.HereticalModif: !!WARNING!! Heretical Modifications detected!!, the following mods make changes to aspects of the Adeptus mods, use at your own risk.
Please try to reproduce errors without these mods loaded before reporting them.
